txt.p: Just a few years after launch, Heidi’s Fudge has opened a physical store and seasonal mall locations, while their e-commerce site continues to boast a modest 5-6% conversion rate for new customers.

We enjoyed logo exploration for Heidi’s Fudge more than usual. The restrictions were less rigid and Heidi supplied several samples for “market research.” With a slightly feminine dash of whimsy, we landed on the swirl as a fun metaphor referencing aroma, home cooking and melted chocolate.

txt.h1: More than a box of chocolate
txt.p: We utilized techniques like embossing, die-cuts and self-adhesive stickers to their fullest. They provide the finishing touches to the Heidi’s Fudge brand, minimize production cost even make hand-packing more efficient. For customers, the boxes set a high expectation worthy of special occasions.
While the packages were being fabricated, we developed promotional materials and a simple e-commerce web site. We coupled a playful attitude with simple, direct information.
